p: Serum samples were collected from 354 patients exhibiting dengue-like illnesses, within 20 days of the onset of symptoms. Thirty-four patients were positive for alphavirusesâ€”33 tested positive for MAYV (33/354; 9.3%) and one for CHIKV (1/354; 0.3%) ( Figure 1). Seventy-eight samples were positive for flaviviruses and are described elsewhere ( Supplementary Table S3).
